Index >  IfUIControllable

IfUIControllable

Description

Returns whether the Data Source supports acquisitions with the UI (User Interface) disabled. 'false' indicates that the Data Source only supports acquisitions with the UI enabled. This is a read-only property.

Data type

bool

Default value

false

Syntax

.IfUIControllable;

Remarks

Set this property after OpenSource() and before AcquireImage().

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See Also

IfShowUI
